name: b1d9a559-c46a-526a-bf90-1cdcc19f2d9c
notes: The models represented here are statistical phrase-based translation models. In parallel we are testing the various neural MT approaches, but for now the most usable baseline in terms of industrial collaborations is statistical.
title: Statistilise masintõlke mudelid
